column2: "...Alright, I want to prioritize the decryption of this data."

"Understood, sir. I'll
assign our best teams to it."
"Hey there, you two."
"What's the matter?"
"Crawford! It's Manon...!"
"I want you two to take a look at this."
"This is the giant structure floating in the skies of Halpha."
"Internally, we've called it the \"Floating Island\", but..."
"U-Uh... What's this about?"
"Leciel."
"...That's its official name, apparently."
"Manon sent us this data not too long ago."
"Wait, Manon did?"
"This really came from Manon?"
"...Yeah."

"While not fully conclusive, the sender's
address was certainly Manon's."
"Wait a minute."
"What does this Leciel have to do with Manon?"
"...I'm going to be blunt here."
"Manon knows the secrets of this world."
"...What?"
"We've only just started our analysis of this data, but..."

"Just from what we've uncovered already, it's full of
information we most likely would've never learned."
"It goes far beyond anything in Rysas' documents."
"We're not sure why Manon was in possession of something like this..."
"Nor why she would send it to us now."
"I... I don't even..."
"So, where's Manon heading now?"
"Is Manon going to Leciel?"
"...Most likely to this Leciel."
"Circumstances would suggest that she is, yes."

"Alas, even if we wanted to confirm that,
we have no means of travel to that place."

"I suspect it'll take quite a
while to even formulate a plan."

"It was so sudden that even I'm
still trying to gather my bearings."
"...I knew something was bothering Manon..."

"...But I never thought it
was something like this..."

"...Indeed. Perhaps if I had
paid closer attention to her..."
"First, we need to analyze this data."

"If she had a way to travel to
Leciel without any special equipm--"

"Emergency alert! I'm picking up
a huge amount of DOLLS signals!"
"What?! Where?!"
"Retem! Very close to Retem City!"

"You there, Crawford? We've got a bunch of
unwelcome visitors near Retem City."

"Aye, we detected them as well.
Will you need backup?"

"I'd like to say no, but there's even more DOLLS
than when we fought Lenus Retem."
"Understood. I'll send reinforcements immediately."
"Cheers. ...Also..."
"What is it?"

"It looks like a Meteorn Pod fell down
at the center of these DOLLS."

"We're prioritizing their rescue.
I'm going with a rapid-response strategy."

"Understood. I'll relay that to our
support and send them your way."
"Appreciate it."

"A Meteorn Pod?! Maybe Manon is
involved or something!"
"Let's go, Aina!"
"What's the plan, Aina?"
"Yeah!"
"We move out!"
"Wait! I want you two on standby."

"We're not just gonna
sit around and do nothing!"

"If we're wrong, then so be it!
We want to move forward, no matter what!"
"A-Alright."
"Just don't be reckless out there."
"Understood!"
